publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2071 Margaret Jamieson: Burns Monument Kilmarnock—That the Parliament recognises the importance and value of life over property and sends its best wishes for a full and speedy recovery to the two Strathclyde firefighters who sustained serious injuries in their efforts to control the fire on Friday morning at the Burns Monument, Kilmarnock and to their families; calls on all politicians to support East Ayrshire Council in its efforts to recover the site so that its significance as an historical landmark in Kilmarnock, which is dear to the people of Kilmarnock and Loudoun and those across the world with a connection to Kilmarnock and Burns, can be retained. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Elaine Smith*, Sarah Boyack*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Cathy Peattie*, Paul Martin*, Donald Gorrie*, Helen Eadie*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Janis Hughes*, Bristow Muldoon*, Michael McMahon*, Christine May*

S2M-2071 Margaret Jamieson: Burns Monument Kilmarnock—That the Parliament recognises the importance and value of life over property and sends its best wishes for a full and speedy recovery to the two Strathclyde firefighters who sustained serious injuries in their efforts to control the fire on Friday morning at the Burns Monument, Kilmarnock and to their families; calls on all politicians to support East Ayrshire Council in its efforts to recover the site so that its significance as an historical landmark in Kilmarnock, which is dear to the people of Kilmarnock and Loudoun and those across the world with a connection to Kilmarnock and Burns, can be retained. Supported by: Bill Butler, Elaine Smith, Sarah Boyack, Marilyn Livingstone, Cathy Peattie, Paul Martin, Donald Gorrie, Helen Eadie, Scott Barrie, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr Jamie Stone, Janis Hughes, Bristow Muldoon, Michael McMahon, Christine May, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-2071 Burns Monument Kilmarnock (lodged on 25 November 2004) Trish Godman*, John Swinburne*
S2M-2071 Burns Monument Kilmarnock (lodged on 25 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2071 Burns Monument Kilmarnock (lodged on 25 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2071 Burns Monument Kilmarnock (lodged on 25 November 2004) Murray Tosh*
